thread.section_title: SaveOnLens Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SaveOnLens | saveonlens.com
thread.title: Patrick Ryan

author: Patrick Ryan
title: Patrick Ryan
text: Their website may not look like much, but I have been using them for almost 3 years now without any issues. The one time an order was delayed (due to being out of stock), they shipped the items that were in stock, and overnighted the one that wasn't as soon as it was back in stock. They're always quick to ship orders out, and much cheaper than many other places I've bought from in the past. I have nothing but praise for Save On Lens! I would absolutely reccomend them to anyone with contacts!
